texts.label: text
texts.orig: Section 3.2 TERMS OF PAYMENT. All fees due to Licensor under this Agreement shall be paid in U.S. Dollars. Fees due to Licensor from invoices rendered by Licensee during the first year of the term hereof will be payable one hundred and twenty (120) days after the date of the Licensee's invoice to a Redistributor or Customer, as the case may be. Fees due to Licensor from invoices rendered on or after the first day of the thirteenth (13th) month through and including the last day of the eighteenth (18th) month of the term hereof will be payable ninety (90) days after the date of such invoice. Fees due to Licensor from invoices rendered thereafter will be payable sixty (60) days after the date of such invoice. Any amount that is not paid when due will bear simple interest from the date such amount is due until the date payment is made at a rate equal to 10% per annum.
